content.rendered:
This book talks about 43 most common childhood troubles such as: whining, temper tantrums, bullying, disobeying, leaving a mess, resisting bedtime and many more.

Parenting with Love & Limits will teach you to effectively manage these common problems in a loving yet firm manner. It contains new information about mindful parenting, teaching empathy and inclusiveness, reducing stress in your child’s environment and increasing his/her frustration tolerance. It also includes:

  • New brain research on the effects of spanking and threats on children
  • New techniques for establishing positive relationships with your children
  • Descriptions of the misbehavior symptoms, the causes and how to approach them
  • Practical solutions for every behavioral problem
